amendment.description: Amendment requires the Federal government to notify property owners within 30 days of taking action which may cause a devaluation of their property.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in House Report 106-525 to clarify that the government has 14 days to notify landowners of their rights.

action.text: Traficant amendment (A002) modified by unanimous consent. The modification changes the time of notification provided in the original amendment from 14 days to 30 days.
On agreeing to the Traficant amendment (A002) as modified Agreed to by voice vote.
